logicalTable.name: F1 Targets Base Measures
logicalTable.description: Targets Logical fact table. This is a different table from the Revenue fact table, with a different grain than revenue (no order level grain).

logicalColumns.name: Target Revenue
logicalColumns.description: Returns the Target Revenue from the Target Facts table, with a Sum aggregation

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.F20 Targets Facts.Revenue

logicalColumns.name: Target Quantity
logicalColumns.description: Returns the Target Quantity from the Target Facts table with a Sum aggregation

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.F20 Targets Facts.Units

tables: physicalTable:Sample App Lite Data.F20 Targets Facts
